title: Bravo State of Housewives with Carolina Barlow & Devin Leary + Jen D'Angelo (Screenwriter of Hocus Pocus 2)!
itunes:title: Bravo State of Housewives with Carolina Barlow & Devin Leary + Jen D'Angelo (Screenwriter of Hocus Pocus 2)!
description:
Danny is joined by True Romance hosts Carolina Barlow & Devin Leary (pre-Bravocon) to talk all things Bravo! They dive into Southern Charm, RHOSLC, Potomac, and more. After the chat, Danny sits down with Jen D'Angelo, the screenwriter behind Hocus Pocus 2 to ask all our burning questions about the sequel!


Jen D'Angelo Interview: 58:00ish


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
